author: SteveL-MSFT
body: `pwrshcommon.cpp` contains a static list of assemblies that are trusted to be loaded when using WinRM remoting.  [files.wxs](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/assets/files.wxs) contains a list of files that should be in the Windows MSI pkg.  We should have a test that validates the two lists are the same so we don't miss including anything or forget to remove something that is no longer needed.
title: Add meta-test to validation pwrshplugin.dll trusted list matches current files shipped with PSCore6
